settings.text: View our most frequently asked questions about the PetSnowy

settings.h3: How do I update my billing or shipping address?
settings.text: To correct an incorrect billing or shipping address for an order, it's best to cancel the existing order and place a new one with the correct information on our website. You can also contact our customer service at support@petsnowy.com for further assistance.

settings.h3: How can I find tracking information on my order?
settings.text: Once your order has been shipped, you can expect to receive an email containing the tracking information. Alternatively, if you log into your account and click on "More Actions," navigate to the "View Order Page" where you will find the tracking details for each of your orders.

settings.h3: If I purchase multiple items on Petsnowy.com, will they ship together?
settings.text: To ensure the safety during shipping, litter boxes, water dispensers, and feeders are shipped separately from the accessories on Petsnowy.com. If you have not received tracking numbers for the other items in your order, please feel free to contact support@petsnowy.com at any time.

settings.h3: Can the pet feeder be programmed to dispense food at specific times?
settings.text: You can set a feeding schedule inside your app for the pet feeder to dispense food at any time you prefer. You can also set multiple schedules each day.

settings.h3: How much food does pet feeder hold ?
settings.text: The pet feeder has a maximum capacity of 4L, or around 3.5 pounds.

settings.h3: How often should the filter in the water fountain be replaced?
settings.text: The filter should be replaced monthly.

The litter box warranty covers your SNOW+ litter box entirely for 1 year at no cost. Our warranty plan includes coverage for accidental damage, power surges, mechanical and electrical breakdowns, as well as software support. You will have access to support from our dedicated U.S.-based technical support team. During the warranty period, we will resolve any product issues free of charge, including providing free shipping both ways. There are never any deductibles or hidden fees.

settings.h3: If I move to a different country, is my Warranty still valid?
settings.text: If you relocate to a different country with a litter box purchased in your original country, we will still honor your warranty. However, there may be shipping costs involved for repairs. Please get in touch with our Customer Service Team to discuss your specific situation and explore the available shipping options for returning the product.

Certainly, we offer repair services. If you believe that your unit needs to be repaired, please get in touch with PetSnowy Customer Support. We will have a detailed discussion about the available options for your unit and, if necessary, we will initiate a repair ticket for you.

settings.h3: Do you offer instructions for DIY repairs?
settings.text: Certainly! To access our installation guides, kindly visit our Video Instructions section where you will find the links to all of them.

settings.h3: How long will it take to have my litter box repaired?
settings.text: Normally, repairs are completed and returned to you within 5 days of your unit reaching our repair facility, excluding the time required for shipping.

settings.h3: Will my repair be covered under the Warranty?
settings.text: Throughout the duration of your Warranty period, we will address any litter box issues at absolutely no cost to you, and we will even provide free shipping for both the return and delivery of the product. There are no deductibles or hidden fees involved. Our warranty coverage extends to accidental damage, power surges, mechanical and electrical breakdowns, as well as software support. In the event that repairs are necessary outside of the warranty period, we will only charge for the replacement of parts, without any additional fees for labor or repairs. For more detailed information, please visit the following website: https://www.petsnowy.com/pages/returns-refunds

settings.h3: Are reconditioned litter box covered under the Warranty?
